list.name: Default
list.comment:
Re-factored deleting recipes and posting comments to return a JSON response and use jQuery ajax to update DOM.
Re-added custom permission evaluator

option.name: VM_PARAMETERS
option.value: -Xmx512m -Xms256m -XX:MaxPermSize=250m -ea

task.summary:
Fixed flash messages not showing
Added ability to favorite recipes with refreshing the page
Added template config file for to provide custom validation messages
Integrated project lombok and removed unnecessary getters/setters and no arg constructors
Reconfigured Spring security and user details implementation. Added additional fields for User model. Created role service file.
Added recipe comment feature and redesigned index page

Re-factored deleting recipes and posting comments to return a JSON response and use jQuery ajax to update DOM.
Re-added custom permission evaluator
Modified loginform method and template to incorporate login and logout messages

MESSAGE.value:
Fixed flash messages not showing
Added validation constraints to recipe form fields
Upgraded gradle dependencies
Removed unnecessary template and data config files
Renamed dao folder and files to repository
Switched to Postgres for DB

Fixed flash messages not showing
Added ability to favorite recipes with refreshing the page
Added template config file for to provide custom validation messages
Integrated project lombok and removed unnecessary getters/setters and no arg constructors
Reconfigured Spring security and user details implementation. Added additional fields for User model. Created role service file.
Added recipe comment feature and redesigned index page

Re-factored deleting recipes and posting comments to return a JSON response and use jQuery ajax to update DOM.
Re-added custom permission evaluator
Fixed issue with requests not redirecting to login page, when user is not logged in.
Removed validation annotations from User class and added custom validation properties and messages to validator class. Edited flash messages to remove need for a status.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Removed validation annotations from User class and added custom validation properties and messages to validator class. Edited flash messages to remove need for a status.
